issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Set OOM control for memory cgroups

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: YARN-8375 disables the unit test on Linux. But given that we will be running the CGroupElasticMemoryController on Linux, we need to figure out why it is hanging and ideally fix it.

Two minor comments

1) Let's add a comment above ` when(cgroups.getPathForCGroup(any(), any())).thenReturn("10000");` that 10000 will be passed to the sleep command. This is a little hacky, so worth a comment I think.

2) there is a misspelling, `aviod` -> 'avoid'
+1 on the latest patch (02) pending Jenkins.
